page.title: 19DOWN THOMAS 1
page.content: {20 people were interviewed.}Of these, 5 people have lived in Down Thomas for over 50 years. 2 people have lived in Down Thomas between 20-40 years.{7 {people had lived in Down Thomas for {less than 10 years.}12 people were re- tired and 8 people worked.All 8 people work outside the parish and more than 3 miles away.{12 people like living in {Down Thomas because it is near to the {sea and is in the country,but still {within easy reach of the town. }6 peo- ple liked it for its friendly atmosph- ere and village life. 1 person liked the peace and quietness.1 person was not very keen on living in Down Thoma- s.{The most notable change is the vast {increase in traffic travelling through {the village,and in the number of holi- {day-makers from Bovisand Bay,and else- {where.}Another recent change is the 17 semi-detached bungalows which were....
